content: murrell s row by ouisi hamilton for chattanooga yarncrafters contact on ravelry ouisih john murrell was a land pirate from the small cumberland town of pikeville tennessee whose crew of highwaymen terrorized southern appalachia in the early 19th century so murderous and thieving were they that atlanta s 19th-century red-light district was named murrell s row this pirate king-inspired striped hat features a crowned skull motif cross-stitched over a tunisian patch and an extended crown folded over and secured with a button tips are included for color arrangement and modifications chattanooga yarncrafters is an inclusive social stitching group based in the tennessee valley patterns released for chattanooga yarncrafters are designed to educate and engage while celebrating southern appalachia past and present murrell s row p 2 skill level adventurous beginner crocheters who are comfortable counting their stitches and learning new techniques sizes child teen/adult adult large to fit head circumference 18-20 /46-51cm 2 1-22 /53-56cm 23-24 /58-61cm finished measurements circumference 18 /46cm 2 0 /51cm 22 /56cm height unfolded 10 5 /26 5cm 11 5 /29 25cm 13 /33cm height folded 7 25 /18 5cm 8 /20 5cm 8 75 /22cm gauge 22 stitches and 24 row over 4 /10cm in single_crochet with larger hook materials yarn fingering weight/sock yarn 260yds/240m 350yds/320m 430yds/400m total 30yds/25m for patch a few yards for skull motif pinstripe option 70yds/65m 80yds/75m 90yds/85m single color for pinstripes stripes x8 20yds/19m 30yds/28m 40yds/37m each for option with pinstripes stripes x8 30yds/27m 40yds/37m 50yds/47m each for option without pinstripes murrell s row p 3 hooks 3 5mm/e or size required to meet gauge for hat body 2 5mm or 2 75mm/c tunisian or standard non-ergonomic hook for patch notions one 1 25 /32mm button stainless steel t-pins or quilting pins yarn needle and scissors or snips abbreviations blo back loop only decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet special techniques tunisian simple stitch slip_stitch ribbing invisible join cross-stitch on tunisian simple stitch standing single_crochet see last page for suggested tutorials notes if you don t have a tunisian hook the patch can be worked with a standard crochet hook with a straight shaft no enlarged handle but a flattened thumb rest is acceptable ergonomic hooks with wide handles cannot be used for this when finishing a round that will be followed by a round of the same color slip_stitch to join and ch1 to begin the next round when finishing the last round in a particular color use an invisible join and then begin the next round with a standing single_crochet in the new color all three hat sizes have eight stripes the hatband counts as a stripe the different heights in the hat sizes are achieved by working the stripes thicker as the size increases for the pinstripe option stripes are 6 7 8 rounds and pinstripes are 2 rounds for the option without pinstripes work 8 9 10 rounds in each stripe color yarn selection tips this is a great scrap yarn project but
